_description: Customize export behavior and API limits. All values shown are defaults.
_batch_size_note: Number of items to fetch per API request (max 5000, recommended 500-1000)
_max_retries_note: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed requests
_base_delay_note: Base delay in seconds between requests (minimum interval)
_max_delay_note: Maximum delay in seconds for exponential backoff
_oauth_timeout_note: OAuth authorization timeout in seconds (5 minutes)
_checkpoint_interval_note: Save checkpoint every N items for resumable exports
_daily_limit_note: Daily API request limit (Pocket allows 10,000, set lower for safety)
_hourly_limit_note: Hourly API request limit (Pocket allows 320, set lower for safety)
